attributes.action: Give everyone £1,100,000.00 when they reach 21 providing they have never been in trouble!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Give everyone £1.1m when they reach 21- providing they have been good in school and not been in trouble with the law.

£100,000 would be to spend and have a good time and the £1,000,000 is to say that they are a millionaire!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
